title: Fatumbot
fatum_project: Made possible by The Fatum Project
generating_point: Finding a location... focus on your intent
use_this_moment: Use common sense, do not put yourself or others in harm's way. Don't trespass. Obey all quarantine, curfew and social distancing regulations in your area.
walktrhough_1_1: It is theorized that your mind can influence Random Number Generators
walktrhough_1_2: By use of a quantum random number generation a random geographic coordinate is generated
walktrhough_1_3: Set your mind out for adventure of the outside world
walktrhough_2_1: Press the GO button and generate a random coordinate
walktrhough_2_2: While the process of generating a point takes place use your mind and focus on something.
walktrhough_2_3: Then you venture out to the quantumly generated random coordinate and explore!
walktrhough_3_1: you are about to deviate off the path you were predetermined to be on.
walktrhough_3_2: as you venture into the quantum randomness or "genesis field", keep your senses open as the story unfolds around you
walktrhough_3_3: you were never supposed to be in this place at this time. you're writing the story now.
warning_3_2: Help pick up trash on your Journey.
give_everything: We've given you access to all functionality. Your purchases are not lost! While we transition in the new version, for every purchase you make and/or have made you will be heavily rewarded in the future!
give_everything_2: We apologize for the inconvenience, you can use the bot by going to settings -> Fatumbot classic
